articles.title: Novak Djokovic booed by entire Wimbledon crowd as BBC commentary team left completely baffled - SPORTbible
articles.description: The Wimbledon crowd booed Novak Djokovic during the Serbian’s semi-final victory over Italian underdog Lorenzo Musetti.
articles.content:
The Wimbledon crowd booed Novak Djokovic during the Serbians semi-final victory over Italian underdog Lorenzo Musetti. 
Djokovic is on course to claim a record-equalling eighth mens singles title at… [+1845 chars]
